channel.title: Double sided door

item.title: Double sided door
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m try to make it so that whenever you open a door, you can click it again and get out, this is what I’ve tried but it still won’t work.

[code] case 4467:
if (x == 2384 && y == 3134 && c.heightLevel == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2385, 3134, 0);
} else if (x == 2385 && y == 3134 && c.heightLevel == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2384, 3134, 0);

	        }
			break;[/code]

Read full topic
